page.title: 08ROSSWAY FARM continued
page.content: produced a year.The manager decides the cropping and what they buy and he gives the foreman his instructions. He is also responsible for selling the crops.A new grain store is being built to hold 1,000 tons of extra produce if they were ever in trouble,which will cost 60,000 pounds.Many buildings have been demolished as agriculture is always changing.The Berkhamsted bypass which is being built will cut right through the farmland and will cut off the main house from many good parts of the farm.Many new buildings have been made so Rossway can compete with the rest of the country in the agricultural market.There are many footpaths in and around the farm but they still find people trespassing where there are no footpaths.
